mapper.select: select a.no as id, a.project_name as projectName, a.start_date as start, a.end_date as end, a.descrition as description, a.status, b.name as crewName from project a, crew b where crew_no= #{crewNo} and enable=1 and a.crew_no = b.no;
select crew_no as crewNo from project where project_name = #{projectName };
mapper.update: update project set start_date=#{start}, end_date=#{end} where no=#{id};
mapper.delete: update project set enable=0 where no=#{id};
